name: Metropolis
description: A massive metropolis serves as the center of civilization, offering unlimited opportunities but also extreme competition and danger. The vast population creates complex social hierarchies, while the concentration of wealth and power makes it a target for conquest or disaster.
atmosphere: Sprawling center of civilization where dreams and ambitions of countless people converge. Air carries overwhelming humanity, industry, and unlimited opportunity scent. Streets are constant river of humanity with people from every walk of life. Towering buildings create man-made canyon system where sunlight rarely reaches ground. Concentration of wealth and power creates possibility and ruthless competition atmosphere. Every district tells different story of success, failure, and survival.
